thread.title: Caroline
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Caroline

author: Caroline
title: Caroline
text:
I have already recommended this company to a friend. My package was shipped to the USA and arrived in excellent condition and very fast, plus free shipping over $49! I purchased Joules Wellibobs and one other item - they were the cheapest price I could find on the Internet.
So thanks, I'm very happy with my purchases!
